com.emc.vipr.model.sys.logging

Class LogLevelRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.model.sys.logging.LogRequestBase
      • com.emc.vipr.model.sys.logging.LogLevelRequest

  • public class LogLevelRequest
extends LogRequestBase
    Holds the request parameters for a request made to set/get the log level.

        nodeIds - The list of Bourne node ids.
        logNames - The list of log file names.
        severity - The minimum desired severity level.
        expirInMin - The log level expiration time in minutes.
        scope - The log level scope.
